doot.name: doot
doot.description: If the word doot appears in the message, this function MUST be run.

when_to_meet.name: when_to_meet
when_to_meet.description: Provide a link to help people decide when to meet. This is meant to help schedule meetings and coordinate activities and events.

paper.name: paper
paper.description: Initiate a search on arXiv for a paper with a query. This is meant to help people find relevant papers to read.
